TextElement.Str: Microg need signature spoof permissions from the phone enable that?
Clean logs, trash & app caches from system and storage
Revert back to stock default settings?

Action.Str: mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /vendor mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /sys
mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /data mount -o rw,remount /vendor cp /vendor/etc/mixer_paths.xml /data/

mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount / mv /sdcard/stereo /system/ mv /sdcard/dual.sh /system/bin/ chmod 777 /system/bin/dual.sh chmod 666 /system/stereo
mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /vendor mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /sys
mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /data mount -o rw,remount /vendor cp /vendor/etc/mixer_paths.xml /data/

<!-- These are actual sound device specific mixer settings --> <!-- Elclark --> <path name="stereomod"> <ctl name="INT0_MI2S_RX Channels" value="Two" /> <ctl name="RX1 MIX1 INP1" value="RX1" /> <ctl name="RDAC2 MUX" value="RX1" /> <ctl name="RX2 Digital Volume" value="90" /> <ctl name="EAR PA Gain" value="POS_6_DB" /> <ctl name="EAR_S" value="Switch" /> <!--ctl name="HPHL" value="19" /> <ctl name="HPHR" value="15" /--> </path>
<path name="adc1"> <ctl name="ADC1 Volume" value="6" /> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="ADC1" /> <ctl name="ADC1_INP1 Switch" value="1" /> </path>
<path name="adc2"> <ctl name="ADC2 Volume" value="6" /> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="ADC2" /> <ctl name="ADC2 MUX" value="INP2" /> </path>
<path name="adc3"> <ctl name="ADC3 Volume" value="6" /> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="ADC2" /> <ctl name="ADC2 MUX" value="INP3" /> </path>
<!-- DMIC numbered from 1 to 4 --> <path name="dmic1"> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="DMIC1" /> </path>
<path name="dmic2"> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="DMIC2" /> </path>
<path name="dmic3"> <ctl name="DEC1 MUX" value="DMIC3" /> </path>

mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /vendor mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /sys
mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount /data mount -o rw,remount /vendor cp /vendor/etc/mixer_paths.xml /data/

Small=$(cat "/sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy0/cpuinfo_max_freq")
echo $Big > /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy4/scaling_max_freq echo $Small > /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy0/scaling_max_freq
Bigmin=$(cat "/sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy4/cpuinfo_min_freq")
Smallmin=$(cat "/sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy0/cpuinfo_min_freq")
echo $Bigmin > /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy4/scaling_min_freq echo $Smallmin > /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/policy0/scaling_min_freq
am kill-all am force-stop vulmax.app
settings put global window_animation_scale 1.0 settings put global transition_animation_scale 1.0 settings put global animator_duration_scale 1.0
settings put global allow_signature_fake 1 pm grant com.google.android.gms android.permission.FAKE_PACKAGE_SIGNATURE pm grant com.android.vending android.permission.FAKE_PACKAGE_SIGNATURE

TextElement.Str: Change the way your phone behaves

BATTERY MODE
Improves battery life by reducing overall system perfomance

BALANCED MODE
Tunes the system for balance between battery and perfomance

PERFOMANCE & GAMING MODE
Tunings for smoother gaming experince and improved fps
To calibrate your phones battery , you should charge it to 100% and the charger should also be plugged in. After the calibration your phone will reboot, then you can unplug the charger.
Enable dual speaker stereo mode for
(may not work on miui based roms)

</mixer>
mount -o rw,remount /vendor mount -o rw,remount / mount -o rw,remount /system mv /sdcard/mixer_paths.xml /vendor/etc/
mount -o rw,remount /system mount -o rw,remount / mv /sdcard/stereo /system/ mv /sdcard/dual.sh /system/bin/ chmod 777 /system/bin/dual.sh chmod 666 /system/stereo

TextElement.Str:
+ Vulmax is a spectrum like app which can be used to adjust battery and perfomance of your device without rebooting.
+ Restarting your device will undo all the effects done by the app
+ When using for the first if the app is taking too long to apply any profile just force stop the app and relaunch
+ app may show its build for older version of android its completely fine
+ As this app is made with my phone it may not fit your screen or even look bad

Do u like transition animation?
if you choose yes vulmax will not turn off animation on choosing profiles. if u choose no vulmax will turn off animations on choosing any profiles resulting in faster transition speed & reducing battery drain.
kill all the apps and flush the caches??
